name: RELS225
title: Religions of the Ancient Near East
description: Cross-listed with: HIST219I, JWST225. Credit only granted for: JWST225, HIST219I, RELS225, or RELS219A. Formerly: RELS219A. Introduction to ancient Near Eastern religious systems and mythology, from the third millennium BCE through the fourth century BCE. Particular emphasis on Mesopotamia and ancient Israel.
